cards.title: The Turf War
setup: At the start of the game, put {Calin} into play Ordained Herald side up, {Kanya} into play Crazed Experimenter side up, and {Sez} into play Gang Enforcer side up.
gameplay: At the start of the Villain turn, if there is only one Villain Figurehead in play, the heroes win, though a threat still lingers.
Whenever there are no Villain Figureheads in play, the heroes win.
After an Environment card not under a card is destroyed, put it under the Figurehead with the most non-Figureheads sharing a keyword with it.
At the end of the Villain turn, if any Villain Figurehead has at least 4 cards under them, flip this card.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the Villain turn, destroy 2 cards from under each Villain Figurehead.
Then, the Villain Figurehead with the most cards under it deals each other Figurehead and each non-Figurehead not sharing a keyword with it 2 Toxic Damage.
Then, reveal cards from the top of the Villain deck until you reveal a card sharing a keyword with that Villain Figurehead, play it, and shuffle the other cards back into the Villain Deck.
Whenever there are no Villain Figureheads in play, the heroes win.

openingLines.default: Ugh, heroes. Either pick a side or get out of the way.

cards.title: Calin
gameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals each target 1 Infernal Damage.
flippedGameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, if this card has at least 3 cards under it, destroy 3 cards under this card, flip this card and restore it to 15 HP. Otherwise, move the top card of the Environment deck under this card.

cards.title: Kanya
gameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals each non-Minion target 2 Fire Damage.
flippedGameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, if this card has at least 2 cards under it, destroy 2 cards under this card and each non-Minion target deals themselves 3 Cold Damage. Otherwise, move the top card of the Environment deck under this card.

cards.title: Sez
gameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals the {H} non-Thug targets with the highest HP 3 Projectile Damage.
flippedGameplay: At the end of the Villain turn, if this card has at least 1 card under it, destroy 1 card under this card, each Thug regains 3 HP, and play the top card of the Environment deck. Otherwise, move the top card of the Environment deck under this card.

cards.title: The Leeches
body: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals each target 2 Infernal Damage.
At the start of the Villain turn, destroy 2 non-Villain Ongoing cards. Put cards destroyed this way under the Figurehead sharing a keyword with this card.

cards.title: The Conduit
body: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals each target 1 Infernal Damage.
At the start of the Villain turn, this card deals each target 1 Infernal Damage, increased by 1 for each player with an Ongoing in play.

cards.title: Chalice
body: Reduce damage dealt to Cultists by Cultists by 2.
At the start of the Villain turn, destroy 1 non-Villain Ongoing card. Put cards destroyed this way under the Figurehead sharing a keyword with this card.

cards.title: The Shock Troopers
body: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals each non-Minion target 3 Lightning Damage.
At the start of the Villain turn, destroy 2 non-Villain Equipment cards. Put cards destroyed this way under the Figurehead sharing a keyword with this card.

cards.title: The Flashpoint
body: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals each non-Minion target 2 Fire Damage.
At the start of the Villain turn, this card deals each non-Minion target 2 Fire Damage, increased by 1 for each player with an Equipment in play.

cards.title: Short Circuit
body: Increase damage dealt by Minions by 1.
At the start of the Villain turn, destroy 1 non-Villain Equipment card. Put cards destroyed this way under the Figurehead sharing a keyword with this card.

cards.title: The Brutes
body: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals the {H} non-Thug targets with the highest HP 4 Melee Damage.
At the start of the Environment turn, put the top 2 cards of the Environment deck under the Figurehead sharing a keyword with this card.

cards.title: The Spike
body: At the end of the Villain turn, this card deals the {H} non-Thug targets with the highest HP 3 Projectile Damage.
At the start of the Villain turn, this card deals the {H} non-Thug targets with the highest HP 3 Projectile Damage, increased by 1 for each Environment card in play.

cards.title: Zenith
body: Reduce damage dealt to Thugs by Environment cards by 2.
At the end of the Villain turn, put the top card of the Environment deck under the Villain Character sharing a keyword with this card.

cards.title: Reinforcements
cards.body: Reveal cards from the top of the Villain deck until 3 Targets are revealed. Play those targets. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the Villain deck.
cards.flavorText: This city has been caught in the middle for long enough. The time has come for its people to choose.

cards.title: Plots Revealed
body: Reveal cards from the top of the Villain deck until a target is revealed. Play that target. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the Villain Deck.
That target deals every target not sharing a keyword with it 2 Toxic Damage.
Destroy 1 Environment card.

cards.title: The Realm's Choice
cards.body: At the end of the Villain turn, destroy an Environment card, then play the top 2 cards of the Environment deck.
cards.flavorText: This city has been caught in the middle for long enough. The time has come for its people to choose.

cards.title: Holding the High Ground
body: At the end of the Villain turn, the Villain Figurehead with the most cards under them regains 5 HP.
At the start of the Villain turn, the Villain Figurehead with the most cards under them deals each other Figurehead and each non-Figurehead not sharing a keyword with it 2 Psychic Damage.
cards.flavorText: Appearances mean everything. If the city sees someone on top, they'll believe they're on top.
